full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` 'JAM DBYANGS NAG PO'I SGRUB THABS NYUNG NGU RNAM GSAL BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003B CES 'JAM DBYANGS NAG PO'I SGRUB THABS NYUNG NGU RNAM GSAL 'DI NI, DAD PA DANG RNAM DPYOD KYIS MDZES PA'I DPON MO AARYAS SGROL MI ZHAL 'DON DU DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS KYIS SBYAR BA'O, ,'DI KYANG RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING  DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG ,BKRA SHIS, ,
